question_text: When installing dual-channel memory, how should the modules be placed?
answer_options: In adjacent memory slots regardless of color
In slots with matching colors, as indicated by the motherboard
Only in the first and last slots
correct_answer: In slots with matching colors, as indicated by the motherboard
explanation: Motherboards with dual-channel support often color code the slots. To enable the feature, modules should be placed in the matching-colored slots.
